channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Template Workflows Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Template Workflows Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-35146|2024-08-02T16:23:59.235Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20template%20workflows%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Template Workflows Plugin 41.v32d86a_313b_4a and earlier does not escape names of jobs used as buildings blocks for Template Workflow Job, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to create jobs.
